segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron and a dress, looking so focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how she doesn't even seem to notice the water at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There are dishes stacked on the counter, waiting to be dried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink is open, letting in a calm and peaceful view of the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she hasn't noticed the water overflowing yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit concerning to see the water just pouring out like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices soon before it causes a bigger mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the peaceful garden and the chaotic kitchen is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
